Summary: series of 4 white orbs, star like size, some directional some stationary, very bright
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
divs: sighting detailsleft work, walking home with my partner in the marylebone area (towards great portland street w1), saw what we thought was a star until it started moving, very bright and white like venus, then started changing color, faded into a dim orange\yellow, zig zagged and it was gone! the second one looked like an orb with flashing red\white\yellow\green lights, we tought it was an helicopter but it changed direction way to fast and then we lost sight of it. the 3rd and 4th were nearer the bt tower, stationary white orbs behind the cloud directly over-head , although one was much brighter then the other (so the 4th could have been a reflection caused by the 3rd) my partner tought it was the moon and was waiting for the break in the cloud to get a better look, unitl it just disappeared like someone switching off a light!
trends: There have been 154 other sightings in London
There was one other sighting in London on or around April 14th 2012
